values: Pursuing the Glory of God in the Gladness of the Nations in GodPursuing the Glory of God in the Gladness of the Nations in God

God’s great purpose for the world is that he would be known, praised, enjoyed, and feared among the nations, and he blesses us to become the means of that purpose. God’s great purpose for the world is that he would be known, praised, enjoyed, and feared among the nations, and he blesses us to become the means of that purpose.
